jot.math.geometry

Interface Transformable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreGameObject, GameObject, TransformGroup

    public interface Transformable
    Interface that a class transformGroup must implement, i.e., an object that contains one or more sub-meshes each with one associated BV.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addChild(Node node)
      Add a child node to this TransformGroup (a transformGroup may have one or more associated mesh).

      • isChild

        boolean isChild(java.lang.String Id)
        See if given Id corresponds to one of this transformGroup children.
        Parameters:
        Id - of the child to search.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the provided Id corresponds to one of this transformGroup children, FALSE otherwise.
